review.title: “At times the work is challenging, but always rewarding.”
review.pros: Pros – Coworkers are high quality people. The leadership is positive and strives for excellence.
review.cons: Cons – The district could use more funding to build and update facilities, as well as hire additional staff to reduce teacher/student ratios and administration duties.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Keep striving for excellence, it is making a difference.
